Function to create LD plot and integrate with SNP positions

create_ld_plot.Rd

Function to create LD plot and integrate with SNP positions

create_ld_plot(
  df_ld,
  df_snp,
  biplot_subset = NULL,
  labels_colname = NULL,
  diamonds = length(unique(df_ld$SNP_A)) < 40,
  point_size = ifelse(is.null(biplot_subset), 120, 80)/sqrt(nrow(df_ld)),
  title = "",
  title_biplot = "",
  ...
)

Arguments

df_ld

Data frame with columns SNP_A, SNP_B, and R2

df_snp

Data frame with columns snpID, position, and labels_colname

biplot_subset

Subset of SNPs to highlight in the biplot

labels_colname

Column name for SNP labels

diamonds

Should the values be displayed as diamonds or points ?

point_size

Size for geom_point

title

Title for the plot

title_biplot

Title for the biplot

Value

ggplot

Contents
